import MyNavbar from "../../components/navbar/MyNavbar"; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form'; import './AddArticle.css'; import axios from "axios"; function AddArticle(){ const addArticleHandler = () => { axios.post('http://localhost:8000/articles', { "id " : 9, "title":"The tiltle of the tenth article", "desc":"Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipiscing elit. Amet consectetur adipiscing elit quisque faucibus ex sapien. Quisque faucibus ex sapien vitae pellentesque sem placerat. Vitae pellentesque sem placerat in id cursus mi.", "image":"https://dl.next1code.ir/images/react/article8.webp", "readingTime":50, "category":"User Interface", "writer":"Nahid Karimi" }) } return( <>
Article Title Short explanation Writer Article Topic Image Article Time of reading
) } export default AddArticle;
